name: Ghost
title: ghost.org
shortDescription: Ghost is a powerful blogging and newsletter platform designed for creators, publishers, and businesses. It provides tools for site design, audience growth, and business operations. Creators like YouTubers and bloggers can easily publish content, while businesses can leverage Ghost for content marketing. An example use case is a local news outlet using Ghost to manage their digital presence and subscriber base.
pros: Open source with a strong community
cons: May require technical skills for setup
Limited design templates compared to competitors
Potentially higher learning curve for non-developers
